page.description: Gets the ID of the specified 'part' of a Panel.

argument.name: panelName
argument.description: The panel containing the part you want to query. This can be a Panel Card, Panel Layout, or Panel Navigator.

argument.name: panelPart
argument.description: The part you want the ID from. Can be one of the following:

section.description: The *[js:part]* can be 'header', 'body', or 'footer'. Getting the ID of a Panel part is useful if you want to set properties (such as the Inner HTML) of the Panel.
